main event: On 8 August 1958, a red and orange, round object, resembling a basketball, was observed in Ponca City, Oklahoma, moving at tremendous speeds while emitting a buzzing sound.
interesting points: The object was described as having small protrusions of light that alternately went off and on., Witnesses reported hearing a sound similar to a buzzing bee., The sighting lasted for about 45 minutes., No physical evidence or photographs were collected during this instance., The object suddenly disappeared, moving straight up at great speed.
sighted object: a red and orange round object
witness description: One witness was a civilian aged 35, and the other witness was aged 11, both from Ponca City, Oklahoma.
